MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW1 postcode area of Crewe, affecting properties in Elm Drive, Lime Tree Avenue Sorbus Drive and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:52pm on 11th November 2020.
